exercises.question:
TEXT: My name is Marco. I live in a small house. Every morning, I wake up at 7:00. I drink a cup of coffee and eat bread. Then, I go to work by bus. I am a teacher. I love my students because they are very kind. In the evening, I cook dinner and watch TV. I go to bed at 10:00. I am happy with my life.

EXERCISE: Marco lives in a ___ house.
exercises.hint: Check the second sentence of the story.
exercises.example_sentence: I live in a small house in the city.
